name: Möbius Link 3D
overview: Möbius Link 3d takes place in a distant future where 2 armies are at war, one of them is the Starfleet Möbius and the player is the commander of that one (Alice Schrödinger). The goal of the game is defeat the other army in all the different missions that game features. The game is divided into several missions featuring 3d graphics and a very complex combat system, since in each turn the player have to move each unit using the game's complex menu system. There is a limited range of movements for each units, the ships takes a lot of time to reach the battle part and the game missions are not so very different one from another.
